sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"差别，区别"之意。
means: difference ： 普通用词，可指事物本质上的差异或数量上的差额，也可指事物在某一方面的差别，还可指人们之间的不同意见。
distinction ： 较正式用词，除指事物在本质上的差别外，还指在某一方面或某一细节上的区分，要在认真观察、研究后才易觉察。
discrepancy ： 多用于言论和记述方面，指两物之间缺乏使之相似或平衡的协调。
discrimination ： 侧重指在判断、见识方面的差别，也可指待遇上的区别。

sentence.Network_en: At other times the discrepancy was of the order of 20%.
The discrepancy in their ages seemed not to matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们之间年龄的差异似乎没有多大关系.

sentence.Network_en: A greater cause for resentment is the discrepancy in pay.
sentence.Network_cn: 导致愤怒的更主要原因是报酬上的差异.

PerfectNetExp.abs: TOEIC词汇汇总 ... deposit 付押金；付保证金 8. discrepancy 差异；不同；不一致 10. estimate 估计；估价 11.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... disconcert 使仓皇失措>安抚 discrepancy 矛盾>汇聚的行为 discretionary 随意的>命令的.
门窗幕墙专业英语(2) - 豆丁网 ... Discoloration 变色 Discrepancy 相差,差异,矛盾 Dismantle 拆除.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... external a. 外在的，在外的 discrepancy n. 差异；不一致 internal a. 内部的，内在的；国内的.

list.abs: 价差的英文翻译 ... price discipline 价格规则 price discrepancy 价格差异 price discrimination 价格歧视, 因人而异的售价.
差距模式（Discrepancy Model）：旨在比较「标准」与「表现」，分析两者的差距，以改进课程方案外貌模式（Countenance Model…
statistical dependence 统计相关statistical discrepancy 统计差异statistical distribution 统计分布
服装常用词汇 -... ... measurement chart 尺寸表 measurement discrepancy 尺寸差异（一般指实际量度结果） measurement 尺寸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin discrepantia, from discrepare 'be discordant', from dis- 'apart, away' + crepare 'to creak'

entry.def: If there is a discrepancy between two things that ought to be the same, there is a noticeable difference between them.

example.ex: ...the discrepancy between press and radio reports.
example.tran: 新闻和广播报道之间的出入

example.ex: ...major discrepancies in payments made to claimants in similar circumstances.
example.tran: 同类情况下索赔人所获款项的巨大差异

means.word_mean: 1. a difference between conflicting facts or claims or opinions;
2. an event that departs from expectations

auth_sentence.content: There is little or no discrepancy as to the facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is little or no discrepancy as to the facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is little or no discrepancy as to the facts.

auth_sentence.content: No explanation has been put forth for the weather-balloon discrepancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: No explanation has been put forth for the weather-balloon discrepancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No explanation has been put forth for the weather-balloon discrepancy.

auth_sentence.content: The discrepancy between redshift and luminosity is a non-issue bec.
auth_sentence.res_content: The discrepancy between redshift and luminosity is a non-issue bec.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The discrepancy between redshift and luminosity is a non-issue bec.

Sentence.sentence: So why is there such a discrepancy between the perception of immigrants' impact on the economy and the reality?

means.word_mean: 差异, 不符合(之处); 不一致(之处)

sentences.en: The discrepancy in their ages seemed not to matter.
sentences.cn: 他们之间年龄的差异似乎没有多大关系。

sentences.en: There was a discrepancy in the two reports of the accident.
sentences.cn: 关于那次事故的两则报道有不一致之处。

jushi.english: There was a discrepancy in the two reports of the accident.
jushi.chinese: 关于那次事故的两则报道有不一致之处。
